actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: Urging the Attorney General to seek dismissal of the prosecutions against three former high-level officials of the Federal Bureau of Investigation who are charged with violations of the Fourth Amendment of the Constitution.

summary.text: Urges the Attorney General to seek dismissal of the indictments of three former high-level officials of the Federal Bureau of Investigation: L. Patrick Gray III, W. Mark Felt, and Edward S. Miller.

titles.title: Urging the Attorney General to seek dismissal of the prosecutions against three former high-level officials of the Federal Bureau of Investigation who are charged with violations of the Fourth Amendment of the Constitution.
